title: SPOTTED watch face
summary: Modern watch face with many configuration options. You must have it :)
description: SPOTTED is a watch face that you can easily adjust to your own taste.It displays the time in both digital and analog mode, and has many custom settings, for example:- Colors of all visible elements.- Thickness of the rings.- Animation speed.- Ambient mode brightness.- Duration of the backlight.- Position of widgets on the outer ring (up / down), which is useful if your watch has a "chin", like the Moto 360You can save your favorite settings in the form of presets, and easily restore them in the future.
descriptionHTML:
SPOTTED is a watch face that you can easily adjust to your own taste.
It displays the time in both digital and analog mode, and has many custom settings, for example:
- Colors of all visible elements.
- Thickness of the rings.
- Animation speed.
- Ambient mode brightness.
- Duration of the backlight.
- Position of widgets on the outer ring (up / down), which is useful if your watch has a "chin", like the Moto 360

You can save your favorite settings in the form of presets, and easily restore them in the future.
comments: Really nice simple design Although the dev only shows this on circular watches, if you zoom out the analogue hands it works really well on square faced watches as well.  Love it on my Zen watch 2
No full colour ambient Would really like a full colour ambient display. Would look great in Huawei Watch in colour rather than black and white
Love it There aren't too many watch faces that I love. This is one of them
Great Good app and the best customer service support well worth buying
No full color ambient Wish developer's would state this beforehand
I had issues but the app. Is good
